modName: Categorized Favorites Menu - Extreme Compatibility Config
summary: A CFM config compatible with nearly 70 popular weapon/armor/magic mods.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This is my profile for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url]. This config file won\'t do anything unless you download and install that mod first. I\'ve used and tested a lot of spell/armor/weapon/item mods (including a few cheat mods just for fun) and added them to my config. I figured some people out there would get some use out of it. It is compatible with the mods listed, as well as any other of the countless mods that contain vanilla terms (sword, axe, boots, ring, poison, etc.). The mods listed are only listed because I had to add at least one keyword to make it compatible or show up in the correct category. This config was created for a 1920x1080 display, so I don\'t know how well it will work with smaller resolutions. Obviously, feel free to tweak the layout to serve your liking.

This isn\'t something I plan on maintaining on a regular basis (okay, maybe I will if I get suggestions for popular mods not already included). If I happen to download new/updated mods and update this config for myself, then I\'ll upload a new version.

A little tip: If you open the \"favoritesmenu.cfg\" and start poking around in the keywords, you will see keywords in all caps, such as <VANILLA>,<PHENDERIX>,<BETTER SORTING>,etc mixed in. These are dividers to help you see which keywords were added to support the mods listed. Any keyword listed after these dividers was added in support of that mod. The <MISC> divider was used for mods that only needed a few keywords added. The index of mods at the top of the .cfg will display any dividers.


Supported Mods:

This profile is compatible with the following mods. * = Newer version is available, but this profile is still compatible with the version listed and may still be compatible with the newer version:

If you discover issues with the mods already listed, let me know and I\'ll see if I can fix them.


----------


Known Issues:

1. Spell Mass Force 1.2 - The spell and power have the same name \"Mass Force\", so there\'s no way to make the power show up under powers and the spell show up under spells. They both show up under Alteration.
2. Apocalypse Spell Package 1.6 - The spell \"Teleport\" in Illusion has the same name as the spell \"Teleport\"  in Alteration from Teleportation Spell with menu. Teleport and Greater Teleport will stay in Alteration.
3. Deadly Dragons Spells 4.4.1 - The spell \"Energy Shield\" in Alteration has the same name as the spell \"Energy Shield\"  in Conjuration from Apocalypse Spell Package. Energy Shield will stay in Conjuration.)


----------


Change log:

1.0 - Categorized Favorites Menu - Extreme Compatibility Config released.

1.1 - Added Better Sorting and Shouts in the Dragon Tongue compatibility.

1.2 - Added compatibility for the following mods:[list]
[*]Unofficial Skyrim Patch compatibility (a few vanilla typos were corrected with this patch). 
[*]RTS for Skyrim
[*]Valdacils Item Sorting
[*]Berserk Black Swordsman Armor
[*]Psychosteves DragonPriest Masks
[*]The Witcher 2 - Iorveth Light Armor
[*]theRoadstrokers Alvin Hews Annika Outfit Set Stand Alone
[*]Divine Aegis HD - Paladin Style Ebony Armor Rehaul
[*]Bucklers - Shields and other Armours
[*]Magicka Sabers Expanded
[*]Dwemer Auto Blade
[*]Flintlock Pistol - By Mikloud
[*]Warglaive of Azzinoth -The Twin Blades of Azzinoth-
[*]Spell Force Bash
[*]Teleportation Spell with menu
[*]Carry Weight Spells
[*]Torchlight - Sustainable Candelight
[*]the Bag of Holding
[*]Fur Bag - Backpack
[*]The Usabale Lantern
[*]The Better Wieldable Lantern[/list]

- Updated the following mods to current versions:[list]
[*]Phenderix Magic Evolved compatibility from 3.01 to 3.20
[*]Deadly Dragons compatibility from 3.2.0 to 4.3.1
[*]Cloaks of Skyrim compatibility from 0.7 to 0.8
[*]Midas Magic compatibility from 0.07 to 0.08a
[*]Black Tower and Black Sacrament Armor pack from 2.7 to 3.1[/list]

- Added food compatibility for vanilla and Better Sorting (wasn\'t previously included because I never hotkey food, but I figure it might be useful for people who do).
- Added a few missing vanilla apparel keywords - Fjotli\'s Silver Locket and Ragged Trousers.
- Added NMM compatible download.

1.3 - Added compatibility for the following mods:[list]
[*]Apocalypse Spell Package
[*]Psijic Teleport Spells
[*]Call Assassins
[*]Summon Nightingale Sentinel- Gallus V2a
[*]Leazers Bound Armor
[*]Upgrade Leveled Items Spell
[*]tom349s Fist Weapons
[*]Ethereal Edge by Hentai
[*]Blades of Sithis
[*]Dwemer Rifle
[*]Better Horses
[*]Skyrim Pets
[/list]

- Updated the following mods to current versions:[list]
[*]Phenderix Magic Evolved compatibility from 3.20 to 3.50
[*]Deadly Dragons Armory compatibility from 4.3.1 to 4.4.0
[*]Deadly Dragons Spells compatibility from 4.3.1 to 4.4.1[/list]

- Added \"Capes/Cloaks\" sub-category to Apparel list.
- Added \"Mannequin Spirit\" power and satchels for Black Tower and Black Sacrament Armor pack 3.1
- Fixed Frostbite Venom showing up under Ice Magic
- Fixed Better Sorting summon spells

1.4 - Added compatibility for the following mods:[list]
[*]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul 1.2a
[*]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches 1.0
[*]Magical Alchemy Harvest-o-tron 0.6[/list]

- Updated the following mods to current versions:[list]
[*]Apocalypse Spell Package compatibility from 1.6 to 1.8
[*]Deadly Dragons Spells compatibility from 4.4.1 to 4.5.0
[*]Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection 2.8 to 3.0
[*]Psijic Teleport Spells 4.2.1 to 4.4[/list]

- Added \"Accessory Bags/Storage\" sub-category to Apparel list.


----------


Manual Installation:

1. Make sure to back up your \"favoritesmenu.cfg\" file, if you\'ve made any changes to it you\'d like to keep.
2. Unzip the archive
3. Place the \"favoritesmenu.cfg\" file in your skyrim/Data/Interface folder. Overwrite, if asked to do so.


----------


Uninstallation:

1. Delete the \"favoritesmenu.cfg\" file from your skyrim/Data/Interface folder and replace it with the default config or a config of your choosing. Alternatively, just uninstall Categorized Favorites Menu and any \"favoritesmenu.cfg\" will be deleted with it.
author: whickus
